EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal at Cloud Foundry Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Cloud Foundry Summit is around the corner and we want you to be there! Join <http://www.cfsummit.com/> us and more than 1500+ developers, operators and managers leveraging the industry's leading open source platform-as-a-service. Register <http://www.cfsummit.com/> now.
Keynote speakers will shed light on the state of technology across cloud, mobile and the Internet of Things and share their experiences with Cloud Foundry. Keynote highlights include:
James Watters VP GM Cloud Platform Group at Pivotal James Watters will present "Welcome to the Cloud Native Enterprise”.
Cory Doctorow, Author Cory Doctorow, a well-known science fiction writer, blogger and technology activist, will present “I Can’t Let You Do That Dave: Why the Opposite of ‘Free’ is ‘Slave.’
Christine McKinley Mechanical Engineer, Musician, Author Christine McKinley will discuss The Oath of Innovation.’
Sam Ramji CEO, Cloud Foundry Foundation Sam Ramji will present “Steampunk Meets Cyberpunk: The Makings of a Cloud Native Application Platform.”
Andy Weir Novelist, Programmer, Space Nerd Andy Weir, who’s book “The Martian” is currently being made into a movie, will share "How I Accidentally Used OpenSource Ideology to Make a Best Selling Novel".
Andy Zitney SVP of Infrastructure Services, AllState Technology Strategic Ventures, AllState Insurance Andy Zitney will discuss “Developing the Freedom to Disrupt”.
Humana will talk about “Consumerizing Healthcare through Lean and Agile Digital Product Development”
Lockheed Martin will share on “Managing Cultural Transformation”View the full set of Keynote Speakers and Schedule.
Who Should Attend:Application DevelopersIT OperationsTechnical ManagementLine-of-Business (LOB) LeadershipService ProvidersCloud Foundry ContributorsCloud Foundry is the leading Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) open source project and is experiencing significant increases in community contributions and user and vendor investments.
Cloud Foundry Summit 2015 is bringing together users in an independent forum to accelerate and advance the Cloud Foundry open source project and help the community set its agenda for the year. Register now to attend <http://www.cfsummit.com/>
